item.title: Adding delays
item.dc:creator: @mathew000000000 mathew000000000
item.description:
@mathew000000000 wrote:

no i dont plus i used your format :S not working how i really wanted ill try to explain lol when i click on the rock i wanted it to do the animation for like 5 seconds and then add the ore and skill xp :S this is what i tried to compose (used action timer)

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1265 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1267 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1269 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1271 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1273 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275 && playerLevel[14] >= 1) if(actionTimer == 15) { actionTimer = 15; sM("You swing your pick"); setAnimation(625); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (actionTimer == 0) { actionTimer = 15; sM("You get some copper ore."); addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[14]), 14); addItem(436,1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } it didnt really get me far

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1265 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1267 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1269 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1271 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1273 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275) { if(timer == 0) { sM("You get some copper ore."); addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[14]), 14); setAnimation(625); addItem(436,1); timer = timeInSeconds*2; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sM("You must wait to mine."); }

item.title: Adding delays
item.dc:creator: @mathew000000000 mathew000000000
item.description:
@mathew000000000 wrote:

I was woundering if there was a way to add delays to stuff

[code]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1265 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1267 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1269 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1271 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1273 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275 && playerLevel[14] >= 1)
{
sM(“You get some copper ore.”);
addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[14]), 14);
setAnimation(625);
addItem(436,1);

	updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

} else if (playerLevel[14] <= 1) {
sM(“You need lvl 1 mining to mine this rock”);
}[/code]

if i wanted to add a delay to this for like ill try to give an example of what i mean

[code]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1265 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1267 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1269 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1271 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1273 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275 && playerLevel[14] >= 1)
if(DELAY START)
{
sM(“You swing your pick”);
setAnimation(625);
} else if (DELAY OVER) {
actionInterval = 10000;
sM(“You get some copper ore.”);
addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[14]), 14);
addItem(436,1);

	updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

}[/code]

any help is appreicated

Read full topic
